crazyballrun.game.level.objects

Class SimpleCar

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.level.objects.LevelObject
      • crazyballrun.game.level.objects.SimpleCar

  • public class SimpleCar
extends LevelObject
    SimpleCar is a LevelObject-implementation of a simple car (like the name says). It offers idle- and moving-animations.

      • onCollision

        public void onCollision(LevelObject obj)
        Description copied from class: LevelObject
        This method defines effects happening after a collision with another object or with a texture. If a collision with a texture occured, the obj-argument is null.
